trade price.translation[0].definitions[0: the price at which goods are sold to shops by the companies that produce them
trade price.translation[1].definitions[0: a price paid by a business when buying from another business, rather than one paid by the public
Trade prices or discounts depend on order volume.
trade price.translation[1].definitions[1: a price at which an investment is bought and sold
He altered some reported trade prices for customers during the stock market crash.
